description: St. Olaf Orientation to Academics and Resources (SOAR) is a required course that provides tools and resources for student success at the college level. SOAR meets five Thursdays in the fall: Sept. 14, 28, Oct. 12, 26 and Nov 9.
name: SOAR Discussion
notes: SOAR Discussion meets on September 14, 28, October 12, 26, and November 9.
